artist: Jean-Pierre Norblin de la Gourdaine; After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: profile of a priest illuminated by two candles; writing in a book, leaning on cloth covered desk; trees, and large, draping curtains in background
marks: Signature, Date, Inscription signed, dated, and inscribed in plate, along right
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: The Scribe
